title: Jimbot Build Commands
description:
(replace ? with your servers prefix)
Quotations are required around parameters
​

fields.name: Post FFBEEquip Build
fields.value:
- **?build** *[build_url]*
Display the build provided with the share URL from www.FFBEEquip.com
- example: **?build https://ffbeequip.com/builder.html?server=GL#219122f0-ced0-11e9-a7ee-83d283e1de8e**
​

fields.name: Post FFBEEquip Build As Text
fields.value:
- **?buildtext** *[build_url]*
Display the build provided with the share URL from www.FFBEEquip.com
- example: **?buildtext https://ffbeequip.com/builder.html?server=GL#219122f0-ced0-11e9-a7ee-83d283e1de8e**
​

fields.name: Post FFBEEquip Compact Build
fields.value:
Append the leter 'c' to any build related command to make it compact.
- example: **?buildc elena**

fields.name: Post FFBEEquip Team
fields.value:
- **?team** *[build_url]*
Display an entire team from an FFBEEquip build URL. Due to the size of the images, teams will **ONLY** be displayed in compact mode.**Be warned this can take a long time to complete.
- example: **?team https://ffbeequip.com/builder.html?server=gl#58d637d0-ed63-11e9-8f21-29aab363c1db**
​
